body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Welcome to Vincenzo's Benzos, where your dream car awaits. My name is Arthur Davis. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Arthur, my name is Madison Hughes.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Madison! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in learning more about the financing options available for a new car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Certainly! I can provide you with more details on that. Could you please tell me your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my zip code is nine eight one zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Madison. One more thing, could you please provide me with your preferred contact number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's two zero six five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! I've got all the information I need. Thank you for sharing. I'll now prepare the options and get back to you very soon.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you so much for your time, Madison. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Arthur Davis and the customer's name is Madison Hughes.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
